nodes.text: Teraeza Furloti was a female Human from Corellia, who served as an operative for the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

In 1 ABY, she was stationed undercover in the city of Tyrena where she was the first Alliance operative to discover information on the existence of a Geonosian biogenics lab that was still operational. The lab was found to be creating mutated Force-sensitive Kwis and Klikniks, which were then provided to the Sith as minions.

Teraeza Furloti appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-roleplaying game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
